org.apache.tamaya.core.internal

Class DefaultConfigurationContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.core.internal.DefaultConfigurationContextBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationContextBuilder

    public class DefaultConfigurationContextBuilder
extends Object
implements ConfigurationContextBuilder
    Default implementation of ConfigurationContextBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder setContext(ConfigurationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Init this builder instance with the given ConfigurationContext instance. This method will use any existing property sources, filters, converters and the combination policy of the given ConfigurationContext and initialize the current builder with them.
        Specified by:
        setContext in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        context - the ConfigurationContext instance to be used, not null.
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertySources

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder addPropertySources(PropertySource... sources)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        This method can be used for adding PropertySources. Hereby the property source is added to the tail of property sources with lowest priority regardless of its current ordinal value. To sort the property sources based on their ordinals call ConfigurationContextBuilder.sortPropertySources(java.util.Comparator<org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertySource>).
        Specified by:
        addPropertySources in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        sources - the PropertySources to add
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertySources

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder addPropertySources(Collection<PropertySource> sources)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        This method can be used for programmatically adding PropertySources. Hereby the property source is added to the tail of property sources with lowest priority regardless of its current ordinal value. To sort the property sources based on their ordinals call ConfigurationContextBuilder.sortPropertySources(java.util.Comparator<org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertySource>).
        Specified by:
        addPropertySources in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        sources - the PropertySources to add
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addDefaultPropertySources

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder addDefaultPropertySources()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Add all registered (default) property sources to the context built. The sources are ordered based on their ordinal values and added to the chain of property sources with higher priority.
        Specified by:
        addDefaultPropertySources in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • getPropertySources

        public List<PropertySource> getPropertySources()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Access the current chain of property sources. Items at the end of the list have precedence/more significance.
        Specified by:
        getPropertySources in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Returns:
        the property source chain, never null.

      • increasePriority

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder increasePriority(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Increases the priority of the given property source, by moving it towards the end of the chain of property sources. If the property source given is already at the end this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        increasePriority in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be incresed regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • decreasePriority

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder decreasePriority(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Decreases the priority of the given property source, by moving it towards the start of the chain of property sources. If the property source given is already the first this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        decreasePriority in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be decresed regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • highestPriority

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder highestPriority(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Increases the priority of the given property source to be maximal, by moving it to the tail of the of property source chain. If the property source given is already the last item this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        highestPriority in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be maximized regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • lowestPriority

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder lowestPriority(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Decreases the priority of the given property source to be minimal, by moving it to the start of the chain of property source chain. If the property source given is already the first item this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        lowestPriority in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be minimized regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • addPropertyFilters

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder addPropertyFilters(PropertyFilter... filters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Adds the given PropertyFilter instances, hereby the instances are added to the end of the list with highest priority. The ordering of existing property filters remains unchanged. To sort the property filters call ConfigurationContextBuilder.sortPropertyFilter(java.util.Comparator<org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyFilter>).
        Specified by:
        addPropertyFilters in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        filters - the filters to add
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertyFilters

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder addPropertyFilters(Collection<PropertyFilter> filters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Adds the given PropertyFilter instances, hereby the instances are added to the end of the list with highest priority. The ordering of existing property filters remains unchanged. To sort the property filters call ConfigurationContextBuilder.sortPropertyFilter(java.util.Comparator<org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyFilter>).
        Specified by:
        addPropertyFilters in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        filters - the filters to add
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder removePropertyFilters(PropertyFilter... filters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder

        Specified by:
        removePropertyFilters in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        filters - the filter to remove
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertyConverters

        public <T> ConfigurationContextBuilder addPropertyConverters(TypeLiteral<T> type,
                                                             PropertyConverter<T>... propertyConverters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        This method can be used for adding PropertyConverters. Converters are added at the end after any existing converters. For converters already registered for the current target type the method has no effect.
        Specified by:
        addPropertyConverters in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type for which the converter is for
        propertyConverters - the PropertyConverters to add for this type
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertyConverters

                                                             Collection<PropertyConverter<T>> propertyConverters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        This method can be used for adding PropertyConverters. Converters are added at the end after any existing converters. For converters already registered for the current target type the method has no effect.
        Specified by:
        addPropertyConverters in interface ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type for which the converter is for
        propertyConverters - the PropertyConverters to add for this type

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder sortPropertyFilter(Comparator<PropertyFilter> comparator)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationContextBuilder
        Sorts the current registered property filters using the given comparator. NOTE: property filters at the beginning have minimal significance.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
